name: Setup Material Log
description: Child table used to record materials consumed during clarinet setup/repair. Each row captures item, quantity, unit, rate, and extended amount for costing and documentation.

fields.label: Item
fields.description: Stock Item used (e.g., pad, cork, spring).

fields.label: Description
fields.description: Optional item description shown on the certificate or internal reports.

fields.label: UOM
fields.description: Unit of Measure for the quantity (e.g., pcs, set, cm).

fields.label: Rate
fields.description: Unit cost used for extended amount calculation.

fields.label: Amount
fields.description: Extended line amount (qty Ã— rate). Kept read-only; computed server-side and mirrored client-side.
